recipe.title: Milkie Way Malt
ingredients: 1 tablespoon caramel sauce plus additional for drizzling
instructions: Place two 8-ounce glasses in freezerto chill. Combine first 4 ingredients and 1 tablespoon caramel sauce in blender; process on high speed until thick and smooth, about 30 seconds.
Squirt chocolate syrup and caramel sauce into both glasses; split malt mixture between glasses. Top with malted milk balls.
